title: Font - O Brother, Where Art Thou
content:
Hi everybody,

Please does anyone know the names of the typefaces used on this French poster for the movie "O Brother, Where Art Thou" ?

I will be grateful for any help you can provide,

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140527134613im_/http:/typophile.com/files/obrother0yy%20petit_5021.jpg)

Font: 

 Brothers Bold 

Solved By: 

 [Mike F](http://web.archive.org/web/20140527134613/http:/typophile.com/user/3368 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
The title is [Brothers Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140527134613/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/brothers-ot/bold/), using the alternate E and R.

Edit: Actually, I guess it all makes use of Brothers.

A modified [Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140527134613/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/brothers-ot/) by Emigre.

EDIT: Late, and Mike is right: I missed the alternate glyphs.
I didn't even know Brothers had alts, Rainer -- until now.
It's exactly that font. Thank you so much !
